page.title: 10LEISURE IN BREICH VALLEY
page.content: As with many other aspects of life in this area{leisure facilities are {limited}although the building of{two {community centres}in the 1970's - one in Stoneyburn and one in Addiewell - greatly improved things. All three villages in the area have public houses and licenced clubs. The clubs regularly hold bingo sessions,talent contests,concerts and dances. The community centres,and in the case of Breich the village hall, play host to various clubs and societies ranging from mother and toddler groups to senior citizen clubs.
